name: TEA, in Boston
description:
TEA, in Boston was made by thisGameDev for Trijam #156!  This game is in [ALPHA] currently, but will probably be developed more in the future!

The instructions below are crucial to read, otherwise the game will be confusing to play (note: this game is very very short, because  of its alpha state).  This game is for Windows + Web.  For web, full screen will be necessary : the UI is not fit properly, that's why.

CONTROLS:

W A S D - Move Around

Shift - Run

Spacebar - Jump

LMB - Dump first box of tea.

RMB - Dump second box of tea.

Note: when you have dumped both boxes of tea, there is no current way to quit.  Just close the application via your computer.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Please don't be too critical of this game - I wish I had more time to work on it for the jam, but sadly I did not.  Hope you enjoy anyways :)

( Multiplayer support might be added in the future, along with other things if this game is supported! )
